Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root["FamilyId"] FROM root WHERE (LENGTH(root["FamilyId"]) > 10)

Input.Description: Select -> OrderBy -> Take -> Select -> Orderby -> Take

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT TOP 5 VALUE r1 FROM ( SELECT TOP 10 VALUE root["FamilyId"] FROM root ORDER BY root ASC) AS r1 ORDER BY LENGTH(r1) ASC

Input.Description: Select -> Orderby -> Take -> Select -> Orderby -> Take

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT TOP 2 VALUE r1 FROM ( SELECT TOP 3 VALUE root FROM root ORDER BY ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]) ASC) AS r1 ORDER BY ARRAY_LENGTH(r1["Parents"]) ASC
SELECT TOP 2 VALUE r0 FROM ( SELECT TOP 3 VALUE root FROM root ORDER BY ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]) ASC) AS r0 ORDER BY ARRAY_LENGTH(r0["Parents"]) ASC
SELECT TOP 1 VALUE r0 FROM ( SELECT TOP 10 VALUE root FROM root) AS r0 ORDER BY r0["FamilyId"] ASC

Input.Description: Take -> Where -> Take -> Where -> Take -> Where

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE r2 FROM ( SELECT TOP 8 VALUE r1 FROM ( SELECT TOP 9 VALUE r0 FROM ( SELECT TOP 10 VALUE root FROM root) AS r0 WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(r0["Children"]) > 0)) AS r1 WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(r1["Parents"]) > 0)) AS r2 WHERE (LENGTH(r2["FamilyId"]) > 10)

Input.Description: Take -> Where -> Distinct -> Select -> Take -> Where

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE r2 FROM ( SELECT TOP 8 VALUE {"f": r1} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT VALUE r0 FROM ( SELECT TOP 10 VALUE root FROM root) AS r0 WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(r0["Children"]) > 0)) AS r1) AS r2 WHERE (LENGTH(r2["f"]["FamilyId"]) > 10)

Input.Description: Distinct -> Select -> Take -> Where -> Take -> Where

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE r2 FROM ( SELECT TOP 9 VALUE r1 FROM ( SELECT TOP 10 VALUE {"f": r0} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT VALUE root FROM root) AS r0) AS r1 WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(r1["f"]["Children"]) > 0)) AS r2 WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(r2["f"]["Parents"]) > 0)
